attributes.action: Protection of the course fee of Tier 4 students and reputation of Great Britain
attributes.additional_details:
The Home office should introduce some type of scheme that college should ensure that in case of revocation of Tier 4 license, the college would pay a specific percentage of fees to the Tier 4 students.
The Government of UK should enact a policy to protect the funds of overseas students by introducing a risk pool or a deposit scheme such as recently the government has introduced a deposit scheme for the tenants to protect the money/deposit of the tenant.
